answers.answer: I know you're worried, but how do you interpret the answer? let's say it is really not so many women who have HPV then it's your risk of getting it in the neck is very small, let us then reverse it and say that there are very many who have it then means of course the risk that get it in the neck or getting cancer of the throat is very small in relation to how common HPV is, we have found that many people who get cancer of the throat has HPV, it's a big difference to come up with how many people have oral sex who gets cancer, as I said, oral cancers linked to oral sex, oral sex, but can hardly be said to be linked to cancer when safe 75% of all the oral sex.give me your e-mail address I will email any inquiries

zebbe - i sent you an email on ***@****.The thing is, I was exposed to someone who i know had hpv-16, so the more women who have it the better (for me). Dr Hook said 40-50% of women get HPV-16 but he declined giving a link to any studies, so i just want to know where he got that from.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JJY2ynlXoKAhave you seen this video of oral cancer foundation, at first it may seem horrible but then it's validation of them that there is no way to protect themselves from HPV and that 75% have this virus, what percentage of those 75 who are high risk is not known, it is only nine types of several hundred HVP types that are high risk and 9 cases of 10, it will disappear by itself
you can not print e-mail address, you may send it as a private message is to me via the forum
I have not received any mail!
how old are you? do you smoke? do you drink alcohol? you have diabetes or HIV?
I'm 34, I quit smoking 4 months ago after smoking since i was 17. I drink a lot of alcohol. I dont have diabetes or hiv.i will send you private message

I have an interesting study on the relationship between HPV, smoking and alcohol, many tests volumes that HPV alone can not develop cancer, but together with smoking and alcohol can HPV be harder to move, you've probably never thought about the risk of getting cancer before you came into contact with HPV? despite the fact that you smoked and drinking alcohol, 80-90% of all cases due to smoking and alcohol, I have not received message or e-mail

question: Hi All,Dr Hook on the STD forum has stated that HPV-16 is extremely common and that 40-50% of women get it. He says this is based on compiled data at the U. of Washington. But I have been unable to verify this anywhere. Can anyone verfiy this?thanks
title: Prevalence of HPV-16
